content.prompt: Complete the following program that computes and prints the total cost of the hotel stay based on the number of nights, the price per night and the tax percent. Assume that the number of nights, the price per night and tax percent stored in variables nights, price, and tax respectively.Store the total cost in variable total as floating-pointE.g. if the person stayed 3 nights, with $99.99 per night and a 14.5% tax, the cost is 343.47Authors: Yana Kortsarts, Yulia Kempner, Leonid Kugel, Kamil Akhuseyinoglu
